channel.title: Efficient Date and Time Management with DateTime (DTT)
channel.description: DateTime (DTT) is a comprehensive Rust library for parsing, validating, manipulating, and formatting dates and times. It offers a high level of precision and a wide range of functionalities.

image.title: Efficient Date and Time Management with DateTime (DTT)

item.author: contact@sebastienrousseau.com (Sebastien Rousseau)
item.description: DateTime (DTT) is a comprehensive Rust library for parsing, validating, manipulating, and formatting dates and times. It offers a high level of precision and a wide range of functionalities.
